Package com.github.tadukoo.util.event

Class EventHandler<EventType extends Event,​Listener extends EventListener<EventType>>

java.lang.Object
com.github.tadukoo.util.event.EventHandler<EventType,​Listener>
Type Parameters:
EventType - The Event subclass to handle events for
Listener - The EventListener implementation to send Events to
public abstract class EventHandler<EventType extends Event,​Listener extends EventListener<EventType>>
extends java.lang.Object
An abstract class to handle the creation of Events and send them out to the various EventListeners to handle them appropriately.
Version:
0.1-Alpha-SNAPSHOT
Author:
Logan Ferree (Tadukoo)

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private boolean inProcess
    Whether this EventHandler is currently handling Events
    private java.util.List<Listener> listenerAddQueue
    EventListeners to be added once the EventHandler is no longer in process
    private java.util.List<Listener> listenerRemoveQueue
    EventListeners to be removed once the EventHandler is no longer in process
    private java.util.List<Listener> listeners
    The registered EventListeners to be notified of Events

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    EventHandler()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void registerListener​(Listener listener)
    Register a EventListener so it will be notified of Events handled by this class.
    protected void sendEventToListeners​(EventType e)
    Sends the given Event out to all of the registered EventListeners.
    void unregisterListener​(Listener listener)
    Unregisters a EventListener so it will no longer be notified about Events handled by this class.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • listeners

      private final java.util.List<Listener extends EventListener<EventType>> listeners
      The registered EventListeners to be notified of Events

    • inProcess

      private boolean inProcess
      Whether this EventHandler is currently handling Events

    • listenerAddQueue

      private final java.util.List<Listener extends EventListener<EventType>> listenerAddQueue
      EventListeners to be added once the EventHandler is no longer in process

    • listenerRemoveQueue

      private final java.util.List<Listener extends EventListener<EventType>> listenerRemoveQueue
      EventListeners to be removed once the EventHandler is no longer in process

      Register a EventListener so it will be notified of Events handled by this class.

    • unregisterListener

      public final void unregisterListener​(Listener listener)
      Unregisters a EventListener so it will no longer be notified about Events handled by this class.
      Parameters:
      listener - The EventListener to unregister
